name: Maarten Löffler
content: Maarten Löffler - Research About Me Research Recreation Contact Research Interests My research interest lies mostly in computational geometry, in particular the issue of data imprecision in geometric algorithms. I am also interested in related fields such as geographical information analysis and graph drawing, and I have worked on problems related to social network analysis.
